title: The Doctor Who Wasn't There
description: Lead researcher Dr. Vel has not reported to the Research Clinic in four days. She lives alone, had no scheduled leave, and her current research on Scourge-wound treatment regeneration is at a critical stage. Director Sela wants her found discreetly before her absence creates panic in the department.

turns.narrative: Dr. Vel's home in the Academic Quarter is locked. Her lab notes are still at the clinic — suggesting she did not plan to leave. Lab assistant Finn says she was excited about a breakthrough on day three and then simply did not come in on day four. No signs of struggle anywhere in the clinic.
turns.choice_a: Check Dr. Vel's personal calendar and correspondence for any planned meetings
turns.consequence_a: Her calendar shows a private notation: 'Follow-up: Fringe Sample Site, morning.' She went to the Scourge Fringe alone.
turns.choice_b: Ask Finn if Vel said anything unusual on day three
turns.consequence_b: Finn recalls Vel saying she needed to verify something 'in the field' about a specific type of Scourge-tissue she had been studying.

turns.narrative: Vel went to the Scourge Fringe alone to collect a follow-up tissue sample. This is against protocol. You need to find her before nightfall when the Fringe becomes genuinely dangerous.
turns.choice_a: Head to the Fringe immediately following her likely route from her calendar notation
turns.consequence_a: You find Vel two kilometres into the Fringe, entirely absorbed in scraping samples from a section of Scourge-growth. She hadn't realised how long she'd been there.
turns.choice_b: Inform a Fringe patrol to search the eastern Fringe sector while you search the west
turns.consequence_b: The patrol finds Vel an hour later but you coordinate the recovery. She is safe and mildly embarrassed.

turns.narrative: Vel is safe and her samples are extraordinary. But she broke two serious protocols.
turns.choice_a: Support Vel's formal apology to Director Sela and ask for leniency given the significance of the samples
turns.consequence_a: Sela accepts the apology. Vel's results are so promising that the incident is closed with a written warning.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Director Sela update field research protocols to prevent solo Fringe excursions
turns.consequence_b: Sela implements a mandatory buddy-system for all field research. Vel endorses the change.

vel_leniency.description: Vel given written warning. Breakthrough samples secured.

protocol_updated.description: Field research buddy-system mandatory. Vel endorses it.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Vel given written warning. Breakthrough samples secured.
